long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline the LNMIIT network access with AutoFi, the ultimate Chrome extension This extension is designed to fully automate your network login process, so you can focus on what truly matters. With AutoFi, you can forget the frustration of manual login processes every time you need to connect to the campus network.

Key Features:

1. Automatic Login: AutoFi handles the login process for you in the background. Once configured, it will automatically log you in to your university’s network without requiring any further input.
2. Effortless Integration: Easily integrates with your Chrome browser and operates silently in the background. No need to interact with the extension every time you connect—just set it up and forget it.
3. Customizable Settings: Adjust your login preferences and update your credentials anytime through the extension’s intuitive settings panel.
4. Timed Logins: It calculates the optimal time for the next login and ensures you’re logged in without you ever needing to switch tabs or manually intervene.
5. Toggle auto-login: Whenever you leave the campus premises you can simply toggle auto-login feature off.
6. System Idle Detection: If your system remains idle for more than 4 hours then after any activity on chrome you get logged back to the network. (Works in auto-mode only)

Why Install AutoFi?

1. Saves Time: No more repetitive logins—spend less time logging in and more time focusing on what matters.
2. Improves Efficiency: Automatically handles network connections, so you can seamlessly
transition between tasks and devices.
3. User-Friendly: Designed with simplicity in mind, AutoFi is easy to set up and use, with clear instructions and support available.

❗️Important Note:
For the best results, use instant login once just after saving your credentials in AutoFi when using for the first time for the extension to caliberate the 4 hours login-logout cycle. This ensures that your automatic login will function smoothly and securely.

Currently Supported: AutoFi supports all LNMIIT Wi-Fi networks only. Want this magic for your university too? Feel free to email me, and we can discuss how to bring this extension to your network.

Download AutoFi today and enjoy the convenience of automatic, background logins for the LNMIIT network!
